Class InputLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.NeuralNetwork.Layers.InputLayer

  • public class InputLayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes the network's input layer
    Author:
    Nicolas Dutly

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double[] inputs
      Describes the array containing the layer's input, where the first element of the array corresponds to the first input, the second to the second and so on
      private int nbOfInputs
      Describes the number of inputs in the input layer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

      Create an input layer, specifying the inputs upon creation

      • getNbOfNeurons

        public int getNbOfNeurons()
        Getter for the number of "neurons" in the input layer. Note: The input layer does not contain neurons, but rather input nodes.
        Returns:
        the number of nodes in the input layer.
